subject: Question about locations for LPR
body:
Bret, 

 

I have copied Det. Dewitt and Matt Triana, Flock, to this email.  Can you assist with clarification on 3 locations that we are trying to install LPR cameras?  I attached a word document with a location description/picture for your reference.  We need to confirm what permissions will be necessary to install or if we need to go through ODOT or if COE owned.  

 

Thank you 

 

 

Jake Burke

Captain � Investigations Division

Eugene Police Department

300 Country Club Road

Eugene, Oregon 97401

(541) 682-5895 work
